name: Diglettuco
description:
A demake of Monsters-in-a-pocket GO for #demakejam.

To play, first download board with markers. Select preferred engine (OpenGL adds some filter effect and is displayed in proper orientation but is slow). Point your camera on the board and try to catch at least 7 markers, then the game will start. Tap (or rather hold) on a Diglett to score.


GitHub: https://github.com/furfel/diglettuco (includes OpenCV4Android and Aruco)

Twitter: https://twitter.com/_furfel

Google Play (game is not uploaded there): https://play.google.com/store/apps/dev?id=8056970146235984514
